translations.english: In spring, first month, he walled Chang'an.

translations.chinese: 二年冬十月，齊悼惠王來朝，獻城陽郡以益魯元公主邑，尊公主為太后。
translations.english: In the second year, winter, tenth month, King Dao Hui of Qi came to court and presented Chengyang commandery to increase the fief of Princess Yuan of Lu, honoring the princess as grand empress dowager.

translations.chinese: 春正月癸酉，有兩龍見蘭陵家人井中，乙亥夕而不見。
translations.english: In spring, first month, on the day guiyou, two dragons appeared in a Lanling commoner's well. On the day yihai evening they disappeared.
